## Maintenance Task Description
A clear and concise description of the maintenance task.

## Task Type
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Dependency updates
- [ ] Documentation updates
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] Security updates
- [ ] Technical debt
- [ ] Other (please specify)

## Rationale
Explain why this maintenance task is needed.

## Scope
Describe what parts of the codebase will be affected.

## Expected Outcome
What should be the result after completing this maintenance task?

## Priority
- [ ] Critical
- [ ] High
- [ ] Medium
- [ ] Low

## Additional Notes
Any additional information or context.
